entry.title: Generics, structs and nulls ‚Äì the JIT is smart so you don‚Äôt have to
entry.content:

This is exactly the type of knowledge you don‚Äôt have to use, maybe ever, yet it‚Äôs crucial the JIT handles it (so you don‚Äôt have to), because every smart instruction is performance gained. Literally, every instruction or every CPU cycle counts.

entry.title: ADO.NET provider 6.6.0.0 for Firebird is ready
entry.content:
New version 6.6.0.0 of ADO.NET provider for Firebird is ready for download. This release fills all the holes in the Entity Framework Core support. To be precise now Migrations are fully supported and query pipeline has been massively improved. Just to give you an idea, about 4100 tests were added. If you want to use Entity Framework Core with Firebird, now is the time.

entry.title: .NET DeveloperDays 2018

entry.title: ADO.NET provider 6.1.0.0 for Firebird is ready
entry.content:
New version 6.1.0.0 of ADO.NET provider for Firebird is ready for download. Visible change is support for MERGE, CREATE PACKAGE and CREATE PACKAGE BODY statements in FbScript.
